title: Someone hacked into my account and now im permanenly banned
body: My account has been hacked, and now the client says I have been permanently banned. Someone hacked into my account and changed the email so now I dont know why. Please help! Im so scared!

replies.body: I went ahead and pulled up this account, and it looks like your account was temporarily locked due to some suspicious logins that might have been someone attempting to steal your account. No worries though, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and you'll be back on the Rift in no time!
Thanks, but every time I submit a ticket, I get a response from a bot, and when I reply with what they want, the submit button isnt working, it's just there, and I cant click on it.

Straaaaange. Make sure you're picking "I need help recovering my account" and if you get Blizbot you should be able to click "Request a Human" to make sure he sends your ticket over to one of our actual human agents!
